website_summaries.verdict: A Timex watch with an elegant style and reliable, functional analog time keeping.
pros: Polished brass has a unique look that goes well with many fashion styles
Quiet operation with minimal clicking of the second hand
cons: The hard back and thin strap can be uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Why I like this watch
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this watch: 1. The numbers on the dial are easy to read. 2. Each minute is marked with a dot, so I can see the precise time without having to estimate the distance between the numbers. 3. I can illuminate the dial when needed. 4. The leather strap does not make my wrist perspire (as vinyl does). 5. It is the ideal size for my small wrist on the fourth-hole setting.
customer_reviews.author: A grandmother

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying these because I love the indiglo feature
customer_reviews.text: The watch is the standard Timex - about what I expected, and what i usually purchase every 2 or 3 years. I ordered an extra long size wristband since the last time I bought a similar watch the band was considerably smaller than in the past. This band is really long, too long really. But since it is an expandable band, I just wear it a little higher than normal. I keep buying these because I love the indiglo feature. It's great to have in the movies, or anywhere it's too dark to see the hands. The Timex watches aren't fancy, but they are reliable and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Happy B

customer_reviews.title: band bothers me
customer_reviews.text: band bothers me because it seems thick and is stiff. but band has nice color. I would call it dark burgandy. fits my small wrist. was looking at replacement band and found it's considered 12mm length. elevated to me means the watch face (body) sits higher off my wrist because the bottom is thicker than other watches I've had which doesn't seem to be a problem. face is beautiful and easy to read. I like having the second hand. the body seems heavier than ones I've had before so I'm getting used to it. it's a keeper for me but might replace band.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Manges

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but one thing to be aware of
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother. Looks good, works fine; pretty much what I expected, however I noticed a odd thing - I can hear it ticking WHILE DRIVING my car and I don't drive a Prius or have bionic hearing. It drove me crazy for weeks because I couldn't figure out where it was coming from and why it was intermittent. Finally determined it was the watch and it's because she wears the band loosely. If the watch is pressed against the skin, then I can't hear anything. So be aware if you are especially sensitive to ticking noises, you might not be able to set this watch on your nightstand and go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: the watch band is a GREAT color! As one other reviewer wrote
customer_reviews.text: I've never gone wrong with a Timex, and this is no exception. However, the watch is quite a bit "daintier" (slimmer band, smaller face) than the picture of it on a model's wrist implies. I was expecting and hoping for something with a bit more substance. Still, it is a handsome piece, the watch band is a GREAT color! As one other reviewer wrote, if you can't decide between black or brown this is the perfect choice. I would call the color "ox blood"... not burgandy; it's not red enough to be a burgandy color pleases me. LOVE the light-up feature!! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: It worked really well for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My Timex watches generally last several years, not several months. I purchased it in January 2018 , and it began to slow in the beginning of May, stopping entirely a week or so ago. Thinking it was a dead battery, my husband had the battery replaced four days ago. Yesterday, it stopped working reliably again. I love the look of the watch, and it was exactly what I wanted--all except for the fact that it stopped accurate timekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Red Hen

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I can't see as well as I used to so this watch is ideal with it's light up feature (when you push the stem). I like to be able to see what time it is in the dark since I wake up a lot and need to know what's the what. It's very affordable and durable. The style is not stunning, but is pretty. I had another one that I lost that I had been using for 2 years without problems. I didn't score for "water resistance" because I haven't tried it in water.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caffery

customer_reviews.title: Indiglo was my first requirement
customer_reviews.text: It seems that every watch I buy stops working after a year and needs a new battery. On the latest occasion when this happened, I didn't have one watch that was not completely dead, except for my granddaughter's watch which she never wears. I borrowed it until I could buy a new one and discovered the indiglo feature. Above that, I realized that she's had this watch for 4 years and it still keeps perfect time! Okay, now I knew that I was looking for a Timex, with indiglo, an expansion band with a more feminine shape, a readable face with gold numerals matching the case and band. I love this watch. Please keep making these, Timex
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little watch, so far. I have small wrists and it fits well, no extra band sticking out the other side. The dial is also smaller, so it looks great on my wrist, that is a very hard feature to find. I would prefer the band to be a little thicker quality leather, as it is very thin and I think it will crack quickly. Other than the thin leather band, it's a good little watch.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to watch for several years. I must have Timex Indiglo. I am a nurse and the light on the watch is often helpful but I also wear to bed and can tell the time immediately on waking. This style has a nice neutral watch band and no date at the 3 location. I could never read or set the date right anyway. The gold hands and numerals make it slight harder to read than some other styles but it also looks nicer and not like just a work watch. I am happy. It keeps time, the light works and the band fits.
customer_reviews.author: DeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she super loves it. I was actually surprised with the light, I think it’s really nice considering I had not seen a light on an analog watch before. The leather, opal, and gold finish on the watch and numbers are all gorgeous. Plus, a commonly overlooked quality: the dial is perfect. It’s very easy to tune the watch to the perfect minute, and you are sure when you’ve pushed it in to start it up. One important thing! My girlfriend has pretty small wrists, maybe small to average-sized, and she wears it on the second to largest hole. If I had bought it for myself, it would not have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlin H.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working next day
customer_reviews.text: Omg 3 rd timed watch that either doesn’t work or stops working within the first 2 weeks of use!!! This one actually lasted only one day. I’m speechless.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap-looking leather strap
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try even though other reviews noted that the leather looks cheap. When I got it, I was dissapointed. The leather indeed looks cheap and is very thin. The watch is also smaller than what I thought from the pictures. The strap creases very easily too. Maybe the metal straps would look better. I returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Denise V.

customer_reviews.title: ... well over a year and it's a "this is perfect, don't change anything" watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this watch well over a year and it's a "this is perfect, don't change anything" watch. Looks nice anywhere; easy to see the time 'at a glance', easy to change the time for, e.g., daylight savings. Keeps excellent time, rarely needs adjustment - maybe a minute every three weeks. The Indiglo light feature is so useful in the dark; and despite getting splashed or even dropped occasionally, it never quits. All of this at a good price - I've worn this watch, or a very similar Timex, for decades! and they all last superbly, much more than worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hardisty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: My watch arrived today. My old watch needed a new battery and in this COVID -19 world, it was easier to buy a new one. I choose this one because of the Indiglo feature. It is a beautiful watch; however, I do believe it would be easier to read if the numbers were in black instead of gold. Overall I am well pleased
customer_reviews.author: TCLongino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Timex Ladies Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is perfect for my needs I really like this watch. It looks great I don't have to worry about dust and dirt. I hike and bike and I don't have to worry about having to take it in to be cleaned. I did have a problem that the night light was not working. I called Amazon and before 24 hours they had replaced the watch for me. Love Amazon. The watch I received works perfect and the night light works perfect as well.. Great seller and Amazon is super as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: TINY watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality watch, but be aware that it is TINY. Both the watch itself and the band are meant for someone very petite. I normally wear a standard-size bracelet (7”) and this watch band fits me on the very last notch. I will keep it and probably wear occasionally, but I wouldn’t recommend it unless you are very petite.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: My watch is Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE My Watch!!! Timex is the only Brand I will buy.. It was hard finding a watch that is all Gold. This one has a Gold-Tone Band, Gold-Tone Casing and Numerals, Gold-Tone (Stainless Steel) Expansion Band, with the Mother-of-Pearl Dial and Indiglo Nightlight.. and it's Beautiful!!! The expansion band is very comfortable, but, is just slightly larger than I would like.. I'll try taking it to a Watch Repair and see if they can take a couple of links out, if not, perhaps I can buy another band. In any case, I plan to keep my Beautiful Watch and of course, I'll wear it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Dies very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet if it's the watch itself or if Amazon has an old/stale batch. We will see when we try to get battery replaced. We gave this watch and Amazon 3 tries. Bought, wore for a few weeks. Died. Returned/replaced. Wore for only a week. Died. Returned/replaced. Wore for 3 1/2 months. Died. Too late to return. Total bummer. This was my daughter's Christmas present. So disappointed. Otherwise really loved the watch.
customer_reviews.author: igk719

customer_reviews.title: Its a Timex! Of course it keeps great time!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Timex indigo. I normally purchase the white face with the black numbers but thought the mother of pearl looked so pretty. The only issue I have is its not as easy to read as the black numbers, however with the indiglo it's not a problem. Its very pretty, I purchased the brown band. I imagine my battery won't last quite as long as I use the indigo more often. I have a very small wrist and it fits my arm just fine. (See picture). Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: syns10

customer_reviews.title: Buying Timex at a local store is better priced.
customer_reviews.text: Timex watches are always nice. However, I think I paid too much for something I could've gotten a lot cheaper at another store. The wrist band is very stiff and hard to manipulate. The Fossil watch that I ordered was beautiful and very nice. With what I paid for the Timex I should've ordered the Fossil.
customer_reviews.author: JBMClass

customer_reviews.title: Strap so short that watch fell off while I was gardening
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these Timex watches before. This time I was surprised when I first put it on that the strap was unusually short -- and I have small wrists. I wore it while doing some heavy yard work and when I went back inside the house I discovered it had fallen off . I've searched but haven't been able to find it in the numerous piles of weeds and branches I'd accumulated, so that's $35 down the drain. I wouldn't order this unless you're prepared to buy a new strap for it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: M Shep

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday, classy office wear!
customer_reviews.text: Handsome and perfect fit. I bought the larger band and it fits 8" just right.
customer_reviews.author: GJ Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch - exactly what I needed! The light is great, and the face is lovely. The numerals are in yellow metal, which would make it hard to see at night if it didn't have the light, but it does and so it works well. The long band is plenty roomy for my fat little arm...I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie D. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the watch. Not happy about the shipping method. It was in a bubble mailer, the box was mashed and open, the watch stem was engaged and running, using up the battery. Needs to be shipped in a box, not a mailer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Defective watch
customer_reviews.text: Received watch on 5-24-17 and return window closed 6-23-17. The watch stopped working 8-4-17 and I can not return for credit. I accidentially started order 8-7-17 for same watch. I did not realize until today 8-8-17 my mistake so will be returning package when it arrives without opening. I never want to reorder a product that was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie R Borba

customer_reviews.title: TIMEX QUALITY WATCH , THIS IS THE BEST BANG FOR THE BUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my mother. She really likes it. I could only find the Silvertone one on Amazon so it matches her American Indian sterling silver turquoise stone watch bands. The face of the watch is mother of pearl and when the button on the side is pushed it lights up at night. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Picky Woman
customer_reviews.text: After my gf broke her watch several months ago I had been on the search for the a replacement that had to match a list of requirements. It had to have an elastic band (she has a tendency to break others), numbers at least for hashes at 3, 6, 9, and 12 and hashes for the rest (this one has numbers all around the face of the watch), and a reasonable size and reliability. Timex is a well known brand this the face was a good size, with a beautiful pearl face with indiglo! It hit all the marks and she was thrilled. This watch is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: the wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, holding up perfect with daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: What a great watch. I have been wearing this watch daily for a couple of months, and it keeps perfect time. It is holding up beautifully under daily wear, and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase it again. UPDATE: The watch stopped working after two months. Had it checked by a jewler, not worth fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam J

customer_reviews.title: Practical  and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an almost identical Timex that served me well for many years so I expect that this one will do so as well. I like the fact that the case and the lettering of this model are gold colored, an option no longer available on the Timex website. This watch is very functional, looks good, and the price is amazingly low.
customer_reviews.author: fitandfashion

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice watch but the bracelet was a little big on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch but the bracelet was a little big on me. I also found the dial too big -- but just about all of the Timex Indiglo water resistant watches are are this big or bigger. I have an old one that I love but the bracelet eventually broke. Wish I could replace it. I have returned the watch but I still recommend it to someone whom it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dezayas

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladies Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good looking ladies watch, plus it has my favorite feature of pushing the stem and having the watch face light up. This is especially great during a boring movie, play, opera, etc., to tell you how much time you have left before you can get out. Or going on a trip and waking up in the middle of the night and being able to see the time. The gold finish with the pearlized face gives it a nice, expensive look. The band is nice, but I'd like to see a grosgrain band for a dressier look. All over, This watach gets an A+ from me, because of the price and the great look combined.
customer_reviews.author: labizz

customer_reviews.title: This watch would be perfect for every day except for the band being a ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch would be perfect for every day except for the band being a little too small. Have to use the hole nearest the end of the band, and it is hard to get the little piece remaining under the loop the hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this watch. The dial is easily readable and the wristband is the correct size for her wrist. She's gotten lots of compliments on the mother-of-pearl dial. The one thing she had an "issue" with was the indiglo. It took her almost all night to figure out she needed to push the button to get it to glow; she thought it would just glow in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L. Walton

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Timex watch, and have worn this style for years! I now have 4 of them. I put different color leather bands on each watch. They never wear out! Just change the battery when needed. I love the Indiglo night light, the mother of pearl dial, and the leather strap.I have dress watches, but rarely wear them. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: I like this watch for its simplistic beauty
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch for its simplistic beauty. A Timex was my very first watch when I was just a kid and lasted for many years. The one thing you should be aware, is photo image is not the actual size of the watch's face. It is considerably larger - very large, in fact. So, unless you want a watch that is bigger than a half-dollar coin, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Can the band's be re-sized?
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch but it is missing. I have looked every where in my house but not where my watch is. It helps organize but I want to see if it fits. I would like to know if it can be sized smaller. I have thin wrists.
customer_reviews.author: jleepaez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. It didn’t keep time at all, so I took it to get a new battery. Within the hour stopped keeping time again. I wasted money on the watch and then wasted money on a battery. What a disappointment. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lily C.

customer_reviews.title: Defective watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the watch three months ago and I've had to reset the time on the watch twice. It's currently running 30 minutes behind. Because it's been 2 months, I can no longer return it and will try to repair it using Timex's one-year warranty policy. The downside is I have to mail the watch to Timex (additional cost) and be without a watch for a while. I'll update this review to include the repair process. It's unfortunate because I liked the watch, its look and quality of the wristband.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Paultre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size watch face
customer_reviews.text: The perfect watch for me. I prefer an expansion band and this is just right. Always enjoy Indilgo light function. Have worn this style and model for many years and am delighted to have a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Doan

customer_reviews.title: This watch did not last
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a Timex watch and have been very pleased. This watch didn't last a year. I took it in and had the battery replaced for $12.56 and it still wouldn't work. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Wrist Band Size too big
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice watch and I completely happy with all except the size of the wrist band. It is much too large for an average woman's wrist. I will have to take it to jeweler and have several links removed.
customer_reviews.author: pefh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive watch and I really liked the indiglo feature. Unfortunately, that feature stopped working in less than 2 weeks with infrequent use! Also, I didn't really care for the stretch band on the watch. I have a medium sized ( 6 1/2") wrist and the band fit but it still caught skin/hairs in the stretchy part of the band so wasn't that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: It keeps excellent time. It's very attractive
customer_reviews.text: It keeps excellent time. It's very attractive. The band is sufficiently substantial. It feels good on my arm. Only caveat, it's not nearly as large as I imagined it from the photograph.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy buckle broke
customer_reviews.text: I really like the classic look of this watch and submitted a 5-star review when I received it. However, 3 1/2 months after I bought it, the buckle broke even though I had not put any stress on it. It was just shoddy, and I would not recommend that anyone buy this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this band
customer_reviews.text: The band felt very cheap...reminded me of a zipper and so I returned it. However, it was comfortable and lightweight. The face was easy to read and the indiglo light is always a bonus. I just wasn't a fan of the band.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky Joe

customer_reviews.title: I simply love this watch so much I purchased it twice
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this watch so much I purchased it twice! The battery lasted about two years and I was too "lazy" to get another one installed, so I placed an overnight order for a second watch. The overnight shipping came earlier in the day than expected. Although plain in appearance, this is exactly the watch I was seeking for my daily needs. I really like the light feature that allow me to see the time when it is dark. Excellent watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelene

customer_reviews.title: Great size and flexibility.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch after returning another that was too tight on my wrist. This one fits perfectly. It is big enough without being so big it slides around. Also like the face. Easy to read with a nice background.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was like in a movie
customer_reviews.text: It was like in a movie... Wife said, "Thank you for the nice watch, can you set the time?" I pulled the crown, it came completely out, then some little piece fell out. Thanks Timex! Good news: got a 3-pointer across the living room, through the kitchen doorway, over the counter, in the trash can, boom. Thanks Timex!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: band could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd watch we bought , because the band on the first watch came apart and since the battery had died we bought another one rather than replacing the battery and buying a new band.
customer_reviews.author: Elkless

customer_reviews.title: but it is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new watch and wanted the reliability of a Timex. I must admit I haven't used the watch for very long, but it is easy to read, which is important now that I am getting older and need reading glasses. I can see the time without my glasses, which is nice since I don't wear them most of the time. The band is a little loose, but not so much I can't deal with it. I love the way it looks, too. It is dressy without being fancy, so it looks great no matter what the occasion. So far it is keeping time perfectly. I look forward to this watch lasting a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, the light up feature is very nice . I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this watch, because my first went out on me. That’s why I gave it a three for waterproof. Other than that it’s a five star, because I like it .
customer_reviews.author: charlottewilliams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I also love that the watch lights up.. perfect for night time. I've had this watch now for 2 months and still give it 5 stars but I just noticed last week it is losing 3 minutes on the time so I set it 5 minutes ahead and seems to be working okay since I did that.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Timex is timeless
customer_reviews.text: I gifted my husband with this - he has always loved the twist o flex band and the lighted face for night time. It's a classic and I love the black face - looks so masculine. Why pay more when this is timeless and works so well. A classic.
customer_reviews.author: pHrx

customer_reviews.title: Too sharp, too big
customer_reviews.text: I did like the face of the watch, easy to read. But the elastic metal bracelet was kinda harsh and almost sharp on the edges, scratches a little when putting it on. Also my wrist is 6" diameter and the watch is way too large and I can't make it smaller.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Comfortable Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this watch! It's accurate, attractive and is comfortable to wear. Fits large, so if you have a larger wrist, it will really work for you. Love the gold and silver together ~ :)
customer_reviews.author: Cookie M. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I have worn inexpensive Timex watches for over 40 years. I am an active person and they are built durable but still look nice for everyday wear. I like the light up face for in the early morning when I am walking and want to check my watch.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cazier

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves her watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 87 year old mom from a local store. The band was a tiny bit snug and the store had no other size bands, so I searched here on amazon and found the exact same watch with a longer band. She was very pleased to get the watch, and she loves the nightlight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Strap too short
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4'' and 150lbs, and the strap is too small for my wrist. I resent having to immediately buy a new strap because Timex is too cheap to include another half inch of "leather". And no options exist unless I choose to buy a huge mens watch. Other than that it is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: MJMcLean

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the two-toned stretchy band. It’s shiny and classy looking. The face is easy to see and the indiglo is a great feature. I wear it everyday. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: mevilla

customer_reviews.title: No plain Jane
customer_reviews.text: This is even nicer in person. The mother-of-pearl face is very pretty and the gold numbers and hands are a nice contract to the face.
customer_reviews.author: P. Swafford

customer_reviews.title: Terrific watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Just what I was looking for. I travel and it is great in the middle of the night to see what time it is. Light is terrific and is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie B

customer_reviews.title: My grannie wore a Timex like this as her "fishing watch"
customer_reviews.text: My grannie wore a Timex like this as her "fishing watch". This must be the 10th one I've owned over the years. I reckon I love them but it's because of her most.y. I like the "glo" feature for night (Grannie's didn't have that) and this type of band is good for working with your hands. You can push it up on your arm while you garden or do dishes, etc without it getting wet/dirty/etc. Is there such a thing as "comfort accessories"? This is mine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle1963

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who has used Timex watches her entire life. Though we have had this one for only a short time we can attest to the quality of Timex. The last Timex after seldom taking the thing off and many years of yard work on over 2 acres, house work, and thousands of hours spent washing dishes, and a few battery changes, though, it still worked, it was beginning to show it’s age. Time for a new one. For the money, Timex is the best watch.
customer_reviews.author: charlene m

customer_reviews.title: I really love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch! It is very elegant and clearly a great price. I did have to have 3 links removed to get the best fit. Also, I like that it lights up which is a really nice feature when you are in a dark place.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch! It is pretty and works just fine. I like the light for night time use. I hope it keeps on ticking!
customer_reviews.author: Morgie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Like Timex Watches of Past ..
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality as compared to past Timex watches I've purchased (of the same type). Strap is very short, feels like cheap plastic and watch face appears mottled with a bubble on one side. Update: Upgrading to 2 stars because, apparently, what appeared to be defective is actually supposed to be a "mother of pearl" face but you could have fooled me. Looks cheap and distorted.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeWig

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it except wristband too tight. Contacted Timex and I have sent it to have band made a little bigger. Waiting for it to be sent back, hopefully will get it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Very nice Mother of Pearl face for economy watch. Love the Indiglo feature which is why I wear it at night so that I can see the time in the dark. Has extra long stretch band and had to have shortened but I always have to do that anyway since I have a 6 1/2" wrist.
customer_reviews.author: lvsknybbs

customer_reviews.title: Versatile watch that is easy to read during the day or night! Most importantly it is waterproofL
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this watch is easy to read. The face of the watch light up when you push the side button. And best of all it is waterproof! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch ever!! I’ve worn one for years and years. I lost mine overboard and was heartbroken. I tried other watches in between but always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Light doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Wore this watch Les than one week and the light stopped working
customer_reviews.author: a happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Little Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little watch I purchased for my mother in law, to replace the watch she had worn for 25 years that finally wore out. She has very small wrists and this little watch was pretty and fit her wrists exactly. She's very particular about the things that she likes, but she absolutely loved this little watch so I'm really happy with it as well. Nice job!
customer_reviews.author: mmcgwire1

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: It is so pretty, I love the mother of pearl face. Haven't gotten it wet, so don't know about water resistance, but if it says so, it usually is. Glad that i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: chips627

customer_reviews.title: I bought this watch to replace another one just like it that I had had for a number of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch to replace another one just like it that I had had for a number of years. I am pleased with it's performance. The band does run a bit large however, I wish it was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Granny 3

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, good looking, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional gardener and I use this watch for work. It's nice looking, reliable, and easy to read. I replace the battery a few times and then retire the whole watch once the band gets beat up and the crystal gets scratched due to my work.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Watch is fine. I meant to have a larger face but ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch is fine. I meant to have a larger face but this will work. I do like the light for darkness.
customer_reviews.author: pocu1412

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the bands on the easy reader but this band is satisfactory (a bit loose
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Timex Indiglo, the other two being the "easy reader" ones with expansion band. I prefer the bands on the easy reader but this band is satisfactory (a bit loose, I may consider having a few links removed). This watch does not have the date, which is a plus because setting it was a pain. This watch has kept perfect time since I purchased it (1 month ago). The last easy reader was slow, despite my having the battery changed. Love the Indiglo. We'll see how it is in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My wife was very happy when I surprised her with it
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive watch. My wife was very happy when I surprised her with it. It's water resistant, so she doesn't need to take it off if she's cleaning or doing the dishes. It is just as advertised, and I've always been partial to Timex.
customer_reviews.author: ICHTHUS

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Better Than Expected. I just love this watch. I wanted a stretch band and they are so hard to find. All the fancy brands have bracelet bands that are too hard to clasp. This one is perfect. I also wanted a larger face that I can see without glasses and this one is perfect. The gold is good looking and the white face is lovely. I would have paid up to $100 for a watch like this so I can't believe I found it for $33.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my mom. Even though she had to put it in the last notch, it does fit her wrist. The face was smaller than I thought and what she is use to, but she does like it. I think it’s a beautiful piece, especially with the mother of pearl. She loves the light on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to read, very nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. It's very comfortable and easy to read. I like the built-in light. And I like that the watch is light in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love that this watch was offered with an XL band. Most watches that I have bought have smaller bands and have to purchase a different band and have to have someone put it on for me. I love Timex watches and prefer them over others.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Ericson

customer_reviews.title: I love that this watch is not only functional for someone ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this watch is not only functional for someone like me who gardens and works with horses on a daily basis, but it's also pretty enough to wear when I'm going out. The pearl face of the watch makes it appear delicate, but the watch itself is durable and has been holding up well for me so far. The wrist band is a teeny bit big for me, but it's not a huge problem. Overall, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: zingomom

customer_reviews.title: A Pretty Little Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The face is more "pearl" than the photo depicts, which is to say that it's prettier and shinier than what you see here. I missed that it didn't have the little date box like my last Timex, but that's okay. It's comfortable to wear, the light is very bright for seeing the time at night, and the leather band is nice quality, although it does squeak a bit when you first get it. I've been wearing the watch for about a week now and the squeaking has finally stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this watch
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch! The extra long strap means the hinges don't pinch my skin. It's a little loose on my wrist, but I don't actually mind that. The mother of pearl face is lovely, the gold and silver goes with all my other jewelry and of course, the indiglo feature is a winner! I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Gina K

customer_reviews.title: So far, excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: Only had the watch a short while, but so far so good. Everything is working like it should and it is an attractive watch on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Snow

customer_reviews.title: The dial lights up in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned four of these watches. When it came time for a new watch, I ordered the same watch I have owned for years. I especially like that you can push a button and the watch face lights up. It’s great for checking the time at night!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Good looking. I love the Back light especially at night. Easy to read Pearlized face good looking. Band is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: So many great features.
customer_reviews.text: I like the band. Slips on and off easily. I like the light. Easy to read. I accidentally wore in the shower and still working.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch band is pretty and makes it a little more dressy than the typical stretch band watch. The band was ten times too big, so I had to search for a YouTube video on how to take out the links. Without the Indiglo feature, I'd never be able to see the time -- even in daytime. I can't get my arm far enough away to see the clock hands, so using that helps outline the hands for me. lol. The light reflects off the face of the watch so it's sometimes tough to see even if you have young eyes. But it is exactly what I wanted as far as looks. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KHiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch but not too crazy about the band
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch but not too crazy about the band. It is pretty stiff and had to remove the extra little band strap as it was cutting into my wrist. Only had it one day so will see how it goes. It does look nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe Logue

customer_reviews.title: Fits & feels good on the wrist
customer_reviews.text: The watch is nice - a little smaller than I thought it would be but it's nice & I have to get used to a smaller watch then the usual bigger ones I've been wearing
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great little watch
customer_reviews.text: Switching back to my gold jewelry. This gold tone watch plays very nicely with my real 14k gold jewelry. Very pretty and feminine. You can never beat Timex for value.
customer_reviews.author: Stitcher51

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: It's even better than how it appeared in the picture when I bought it. Classic time piece for those of us who don't get too frilly, but still want an attractive but practical watch. It's nice looking with dressy clothes and just right with everyday wear. I've never had an indigo watch, and I love that feature. It's extremely comfortable on my largish wrist. I couldn't be happier with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: EE Bookwright

customer_reviews.title: Great watch-great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this watch. I had one just like it and lost it somehow so was very happy I could still get on exactly like my old one. It's a very attractive watch that keeps great time! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SallyT

customer_reviews.title: This watch is useful, reliable and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is easy to read because of its clear face and its INDIGLO feature. It is water resistant and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Racy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and fits a larger wrist well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Ihad the same watch for years but it was showing signs that the battery is wearing down so I bought another. I had changed the battery on the old one once, but after several years of daily wear the stem was getting corroded so when it showed signs of needing a new battery I decided to get a new one instead of changing out the battery (which requires a special tool so you cannot do it yourself). That you cannot easily give it a new battery is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Bresowar

customer_reviews.title: Band length is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the length of the band! It is perfect. The “meaty” part of my wrist is 7 inches, and this does slide around a little bit on my wrist if I wear it at the smallest part of my wrist. Exactly what I was looking for! I didn’t think my previous watch band felt tight, but I began experiencing tingling and numbness in my little finger and low and behold discovered it was from my watchband being snug. This band is great.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Timex rocks!
customer_reviews.text: For years my everyday watches have been these indiglow Timexes. I have both stainless and gold, and replace them as needed. The only criticism I have is that with the exception of one light brown band, all the brown bands are too short. The old tan keeps going, and I replace the too-short band when I get a new watch. This isn't a problem with the black bands.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

    *  #75 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars1,412 ratings
feature_bullets: Adjustable brown croco patterned 12mm genuine leather strap fits up to 7.5-inch wrist circumference
Mother of pearl dial with gold-tone full Arabic numerals
Gold-tone 25mm brass case with mineral glass crystal
Water resistant to 30m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
